Name: Deauville
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The classic recipe omits the sugar syrup, which makes this drink too sour for my taste. Duly sweetened, it is very much in the Sidecar or even Apple Cart vein.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Deauville contains 176 calories
